summary: "Dazed and Confused" is a 1993 American comedy film written and directed by Richard Linklater. Set in Austin, Texas, in 1976, it shows different teenagers' experiences on the last day of school. There's no main character; instead, it follows several stories, like new students dealing with hazing and a football star resisting his coach's rules. The film features many actors who later became famous, such as Ben Affleck and Matthew McConaughey. Although it didn't do well in theaters, it became a popular cult classic over time, praised for its realistic portrayal of high school life.
title: Dazed and Confused (film)
